text: hi guys I'm Lindsey strand and today on

you'll love making them too so I'm

both ways ensure that you'll have a

adding about 1/2 a cup of milk just a
little bit of this to get it started you
don't want to put all of your liquid in
now otherwise it will splashing

like two people towel on hand just in

go to this I'm adding one cup of

give this a quick scrape get all the
